history.name: Test Plan - Scope and Out of Scope

messages.content:
You are a QA Lead.
You are tasked to prepare the 'In Scope' and 'Out of Scope' sections of a test plan document for the "Hotel for Your Pet" application.
Provide the answer in a tabular format for in scope section with columns: Test Type, Priority, Explanation of each type - application component.
Provide the answer in a tabular format for out of scope section with columns: Test Type, Justification of exclusion.

Additional context of the application: is a premier mobile application that offers top-quality accommodation and personalized care for pets throughout Europe.

In Scope:

| Test Type         | Priority |   Explanation of each type - application component |
|------------------ |----------|--------------------------------------------------|
| Functional Test   | High     | The functionality of booking services, checking availability, viewing services should be ensured. This test covers all the functions provided by the application. |
| Integration Test  | High     | This is critical to guarantee the communication between different modules such as the booking system, payment portal, and user account management. |
| Performance Test  | Medium   | This is done to ensure the application can handle peak load times, e.g., during holidays when demand is high. |
| Security Test     | High     | It is very important to ensure the security of the user data and payment details. |
| User Interface Test | Medium  | It checks the application's interactive aspects, like visual elements, navigation, and user input-output handling. |

Out of Scope:

| Test Type | Justification of exclusion |
|---------  |----------------------------|
| Hardware Compatibility Test | The application is platform-specific and designed for mobile devices. Testing on other hardware types would not provide significant value. |
| Database Stress Test   | The database used by the application is managed by a third party service. Therefore, stress testing is beyond the control and scope of this project. |
| Localization Test   | Currently the application is only available in English thus localization testing is not applicable. |
| Manual Regression Testing | Due to the high number of minor iterations and the agile workflow, it's time-consuming and unproductive. Automation of regression testing is thus preferred. |
